settings.liquid:
<style>
 footer, .shopify-section--announcement-bar {
display: none!important;
}


</style>


<script>
    function setCookie(name, value, days) {
        let date = new Date();
        date.setTime(date.getTime() + (days * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
        document.cookie = name + "=" + value + "; path=/; expires=" + date.toUTCString();
    }

    window.addEventListener("message", function(event) {
        if (event.data.setCookie) {
            setCookie(event.data.setCookie, event.data.value, event.data.days);
        }
    });
</script>

<script>
    function getCookie(name) {
        let match = document.cookie.match(new RegExp('(^| )' + name + '=([^;]+)'));
        return match ? match[2] : null;
    }

    window.addEventListener("load", function() {
        if (getCookie("quiz_completed") === "true") {
            window.top.location.href = "https://gumpaws.com/products/probiotic-care";
        }
    });
</script>
